channel.title: Can u plz take the time to answer
channel.description:
ok so i posted my server on the status page yesterday and i dont see it up yet and it has the download and everything on the page but people are still somehow trying to log on, it says on my cmd prompt, it says like "bgs tried to log on bgs disconnected" like after 3 seconds they always disconnect and im wondering if its because there not using the client or what. well its just really confusing does anybody know whats going on?
(and i cant give u download link to help me test and figure out whats wrong cuz i dont know it, its onlly on the status page -.-)

item.title: Can u plz take the time to answer
item.dc:creator: @starstorm starstorm
item.description:
@starstorm wrote:

ooo thats prolly it cuz i have a custom interface, but i never told anybody my server ip so how could ppl know?

Read full topic
item.source: Can u plz take the time to answer

item.title: Can u plz take the time to answer
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:5, topic:335254”]or your client’s login “UID” Doesnt match the Servers set “UID”[/quote] Or you have custom welcome interface so if they dont use your client they freeze when trying to log in:D

Read full topic
